<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81880</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81880</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing -- Using Similes and Metaphors</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura – Utilización de símiles y metáforas</string>
            <string language="ga">Scríbhneoireacht – Samhlacha agus Meafair a Úsáid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben -- Verwenden von von Similes und von von
Metaphern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inscription -- à l'aide des Comparaisons et des 
métaphores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita -- usando Similes e metaphors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura -- per mezzo di Similes e delle 
metafore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο -- που χρησιμοποιεί similes και τις 
μεταφορές</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children learn about similes and metaphors through analysis of examples found in a variety of children's literature.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños aprenden los que son los símiles y las metáforas mediante el análisis de ejemplos encontrados en diversa literatura infantil.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foghlaimíonn leanaí faoi shamhlacha agus faoi mheafair trí anailís a dhéanamh ar roinnt samplaí a fhaightear i litríocht do leanaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder erlernen über similes und Metaphern durch 
Analyse der Beispiele, die in einer Vielzahl der Literatur der Kinder 
gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants se renseignent sur des comparaisons et 
des métaphores par l'analyse des exemples trouvés dans une variété
de la littérature des enfants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças aprendem sobre similes e metaphors 
com a análise dos exemplos encontrados em uma variedade da literatura
das crianças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini imparano circa i similes e le metafore 
con analisi degli esempi trovati in una varietà di letteratura dei 
bambini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά μαθαίνουν για similes και τις μεταφορές 
μέσω της ανάλυσης των παραδειγμάτων που βρίσκονται στη λογοτεχνία
ποικίλων παιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
